name: Simple Subscription Tracker
description: Start saving money today by cancelling under-utilized servicesSubscription Tracker is a subscription management tool for keeping track of all your monthly and yearly subscriptions, thus allowing you to be reminded of the actions required before auto-renewal payments kick in.Recurring subscriptions add up really quickly and you would be surprised to find out the total amount you're paying each month!Features Auto-calculate monthly/yearly costs by subscription typeAuto-calculate renewal payment da
features: Auto-calculate monthly/yearly costs by subscription type; Auto-calculate renewal payment date; Custom categories for subscriptions; Monthly view of subscriptions by category type; Yearly view of subscriptions by category type; Search, filter and sort subscriptions; Notion template; Tutorial guide on how to use the template; Sample entries included to demonstrate usage; Lifetime access and updates
